TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XpsFont extends System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResource

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別有沒有公用建構函式。The class has no public constructor. 使用將字型加入，並取得其參考新的文件中的方法。Use the method to add a font and obtain a reference to it in a new document. 使用方法，以取得現有的文件中的字型參考。Use the method to obtain a font reference in an existing document. 根據設定的和，這類並，排清作業方法類別可能會延遲到整個關閉。Based on settings of and , such as and , the flush operation of the method of the class may be delayed until the whole is closed. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何將字型新增。The following example shows how to add fonts to an . [!code-cpp[XpsCreate#XpsCreateAddPageResources](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CPP/XpsCreate.cpp#xpscreateaddpageresources)] [!code-csharp[XpsCreate#XpsCreateAddPageResources](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CSharp/XpsCreate.cs#xpscreateaddpageresources)] [!code-vb[XpsCreate#XpsCreateAddPageResources](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/visualbasic/xpscreate.vb#xpscreateaddpageresources)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需有關模糊化字型的詳細資訊，請參閱 2.1.7.3"內嵌字型模糊化 」 中*XML Paper Specification (XPS)* 下載[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761 ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761)。For more information about font obfuscation, see Section 2.1.7.3 "Embedded Font Obfuscation" in the *XML Paper Specification (XPS)* available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需有關使用的受限制的字型，請參閱*XML Paper Specification (XPS)* 下載[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761 ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761)。For more information about the use of restricted fonts, see the *XML Paper Specification (XPS)* available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).

param.name: guid
param.span: 用於將 模糊化的全域唯一識別碼 (GUID)。

span.span: The globally unique identifier (GUID) to use to obfuscate the .

summary.span: 模糊化字型的字樣資料。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法提供給使用當您要模糊化義務授權專屬的字型。The method is provided for use when you are legally obligated to obfuscate licensed proprietary fonts. 這個方法不提供加密，雖然方法可以用來禁止使用者從解壓縮的專屬[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_opentype](~/includes/tlasharptla-opentype-md.md)]字型和其他用途的個別安裝。While this method does not provide encryption, the method can be used to inhibit users from unzipping proprietary [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_opentype](~/includes/tlasharptla-opentype-md.md)] fonts and installing them separately for other uses. 如需有關模糊化字型的詳細資訊，請參閱 2.1.7.3"內嵌字型模糊化 」 中*XML Paper Specification (XPS)* 下載[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761 ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761)。For more information about font obfuscation, see Section 2.1.7.3 "Embedded Font Obfuscation" in the *XML Paper Specification (XPS)* available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).
